product_a.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

product_b.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning and evening, after toning but before moisturizing

narrative: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum and Radiance Renewal Serum are two distinct skincare products catering to different skin types and concerns. GlowBoost is suitable for oily and combination skin, providing brightening and dark spot-fading benefits. Radiance Renewal, on the other hand, is designed for dry and sensitive skin, focusing on hydration and skin elasticity improvement. While both products have their unique strengths, their concentrations and notable ingredients differ, making them suitable for different skin types and needs.
